website_summaries.verdict: Single pin bow sights are very popular, especially among amateur archers. While this sight does have some measurement limitations, it performs well in 3D target practice and competition shooting.
pros: Lighted single pin easy to adjust
Performance comparable to more expensive HHA contender

customer_reviews.title: Got it on time in great shape. NO instructions what so ever
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time in great shape. NO instructions what so ever!! I did get it on and it works, but have not shot the bow since putting the sight on. I am disappointed about the instructions though, that is why it did not get a 5 star. If there are instructions, please send them, they might have something that I could use to get everything set up like it should be. thanks
customer_reviews.author: R. Worsham

customer_reviews.title: Great sight. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sight. Much more affordable than many other single pin, adjustable sights. I shoot with glasses that are very strong and it gives me just one point to focus on while aiming. This has improved my shooting and I took my first whitetail with it. The fiber optic point is bright and sighting it in was easy. The glowing outer ring around the sight was helpful also.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Vanderplas

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, if you know your yardages or have a range finder you do get a view of all ur site pins thru ur peep site. You only see one pins, there’s no confusion and it moves up and down with no effort for that quick shot if needed once you get all ur yardages marked out. I just can’t say enough good things about this site. I luv it.
customer_reviews.author: 8upcowboy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this sight. Took a little time to sight in bc I was scared to step back to certain distances. But after that this bow sight has been lights out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the sight, haven't used it yet but it's exactly what I thought! Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because it was missing mounting screws and all other accessories. It was from the Amazon warehouse, which missing accessories is pretty much par for the course.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Good site!
customer_reviews.text: A great site if your looking for a step up from an entry level site. Is it an Spot Hogg? Of course not! Is it still a very dependable and accurate site. Yes sir! Only downside is the lack of pre marked tape options, but that's not a big deal. All in all I have been satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great sight
customer_reviews.text: I am very accurate and was successful in the field with this sight. Easy to set up but I did need to write my distances on band. I was accurate to 80+ yards with no issues from the sight. The battery location can get cross-screwed easily so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: AZ diver

customer_reviews.title: Best for our budget
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very excited to get this scope for Christmas. It’s the best quality for the price I could find. Hasn’t been able to shoot with it yet, but so far has loved.
customer_reviews.author: bravecoward

customer_reviews.title: Epic sight
customer_reviews.text: This sight is great!!! I shoot in 4-H with with this sight and won first. Ive shot 3D with this sight and did very well. I shoot a trykon Hoyt at about 50 pounds and I can shoot anywhere between 20 and 60 yards. The only thing that could have made this a better sight is if it. Came with yard stickers. One of my buddy's has an HHA sight and this one is every bit as good as the HHA.
customer_reviews.author: Girlinpink22rifle

customer_reviews.title: Good sight with flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great flexibility for yardage. Mine is sighted out to 120 yards starting at 40. However the light thread came stripped out and the the slide is not as smooth as I was hoping for. Good for the price but I would recommend spending 40 extra on the next step up.
customer_reviews.author: Austin S

customer_reviews.title: Great sight
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, love that it lights up! I just wish it had distance printed on the adjuster
customer_reviews.author: Alivia B

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it especially if the hubby kills a deer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands bow. He hasn’t put it on yet but I hope he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson to put on his nowhere loves it so far
customer_reviews.author: robert shipp

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice big field of view. Bright pin. Holds zero. Easy to move to change distance and then lock in place. Shot a 3 arrow, 3 inch group at 50 yards. Love this sight.....price was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sight!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - shot a doe the first time I hunted with it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kay Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Greatness is right here
customer_reviews.text: Great sight to use! It can shoot very far with light poundage. Like I can shoot accurate over 40 yards! I can Lung and heart shoot my bow target with it from far distance! Overall it is a great sight.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M Owen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Box was opened and did not come with outing screws
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use lock tight on something that you know has to be moved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why somebody would put lock tight on a site that has to be moved is dumb. I broke both screws trying to get my zero. Thanks for nothing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I installed this sight on my bow and had no ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this sight on my bow and had no problems getting it sighted in. On Monday went hunting with it, first night out and shot a big 9 point buck at 16 yards
customer_reviews.author: Lance Bushar

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass this one
customer_reviews.text: The ease of installment along with the field of view when shooting longer distance is Amazing. I fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this, 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, the reostat is bright and the range slide holds true. I will put this on every bow from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: ghost

customer_reviews.title: Great sight.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this single pin sight. Very easy to sight in and use, improved my accuracy instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sight
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Moved from a 5 pin to this and there's so much clearance to see. Picks up light well and even has the electronic light too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kyle bak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over the summer, sighted in on a walking course nearby out to 80 yds. Animal down in Sept.
customer_reviews.author: Adams/Maras

customer_reviews.title: Set your sites on this!
customer_reviews.text: For the archers in your life. We bought this for my husband. Sweet accessory.
customer_reviews.author: zbluesun

customer_reviews.title: 1 pin sight
customer_reviews.text: This sight is amazing so far! I like its versatility!
customer_reviews.author: KHChupp

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it, very easy to install and sight in
customer_reviews.author: Colby grimes

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Works as I expected I didn't receive ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works as I expected I didn't receive the tape kit. It was sent to my old address. It is probably lost in the mail or was returned to Trophy ridge.
customer_reviews.author: charles o. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and great service looking forward for future purchase, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Morilas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bow sight. one of the best economical 1 pin sights to use and buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a awesome sight for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome sight for the price. Easy to set up and shoots spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Dean hayman

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawlessly!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sight for my 2011 BowTech Assassin and have absolutely no complaints about it whatsoever. The slider mechanism works smoothly and I found it was quite easy to get sighted in. I would highly recommend this site to anyone, even those who've shot the "higher end" single pin sliders (which I have). This sight serves the same purpose at less than half the price. The construction of it seems to be every bit as high quality as any sight I've ever owned too. If there is a deficiency in this sight when compared to the more expensive sights, I've yet to find it. Thank you for reading my review. I hope you've found this information helpful :)
customer_reviews.author: maufenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it already harvested a deer with it this year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good site. Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Good site. Accurate. Would have given 5 stars but it doesn't come w/ yardage tape.. I used hha.. Worked well
customer_reviews.author: richard a

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst sight I ever bought. Very hard to sight in.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great sight!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised. Easily adjusts, stays solid, no vibration, nice bead pin. It allowed me to get 20-80 yards on the adjustment range. I marked it with a fine point sharper. Well, my wife done it because she writes neater.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlie

customer_reviews.title: cheap sight get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I didn't even get 3 arrows shot with this sight before it broke on me...I had it professionally installed and we were sighting it in and never once touched the gold adjustable knob and got the sight where I wanted it and went to tighten it and went all the way tight and he (pro shop staff) said that isn't right so we started to loosen it and it just came all the way off and the screw was broken inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kacia Kendhammer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and quick to adjust..Pin is super bright in low light situations..Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No way to display the yardage markers neatly
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use this sight looks very accurate however the only reason I gave it three stars is because they should give you a couple yardage stickers or something with it so you don't have to mark it up with a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Weldaholic585

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sight. Bought for my son, who primarily is a target shooter in a sportsman's club. Only complaint is that it would be nice to have extra yardage tapes, or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: B Shuford

customer_reviews.title: Great sight great price
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Had my archery place install it. Works great. There are no instructions or info. It comes with the reohstat batteries installed. Lights up great can't wait to use at dusk. Wish there would be more photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bartsch

customer_reviews.title: Great sight and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Got an awesome deal on this sight and it works flawlessly. Wearing glasses I had a hard time picking up the target with horizontal pins blocking the view. No issues with the small single vertical pin. I immediately got 6-8 inch groups at 60 yards. The level and small sight pin made all the difference. It did take some time to get my ranges marked, but it is dead on when the range is right.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Keep it simple for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep it simple and affordable .This site has worked out very well so far my shots have been right on fron 20,30and 40 yards on target with good groups.
customer_reviews.author: heli a angarita

customer_reviews.title: Tropy Ridge Pursuit sight is OK
customer_reviews.text: This sight is well made and has an quick vertical adjustment know. However windage is another issue. You have to use an allen wrench to unlock it and then there is no fine adjustment knob. You slide the pin housing by hand. It is ponderous and takes some manipulation. So if the wind is blowing left to right aim to the left. Wow.The scope housing itself does not have threads for a magnification glass. You have to pay more to get more. All in all this will get you on target and as you change distance you can quickly make a vertical adjustment. If you want more, pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sincler

customer_reviews.title: Great sight
customer_reviews.text: Great sight. Took about an hr to get it sighted in. Did not come with directions. Does not come with sight tape either. I used a small mailing label and cut it to match where needs to go. Definitely getting tighter arrow groups from longer distance.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Young

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sight for the money. I'm a relatively new archery shooter and I had no problem shooting much tighter groups with this sight. The light works well but it is a tad short in my opinion. It screws in very snuggly beside the sight housing. Not much room there to manipulate the light with your fingers. Other than that, I wish they would include replacement yardage tapes. So you could transfer it to new bows down the line or replace it if it ever gets damaged or just needs refreshed. But for the money... I can't complain and I'd recommend it to anyone Wanting to shoot tighter groups on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Green

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for PSE BRUTE FORCE
customer_reviews.text: On Left hand PSE brute force RTS: Pros: pin is bright Well built Cons: Minimal adjustment for windage and elevation despite what the description states; for windage I had to slide the sight so far over that I lost half my sight picture behind my bow when aiming through peep sight, and for elevation I had to use, nearly, the entire slide-downward in order to properly adjust all for a 10 yd zero. Obviously, this outcome warranted a return. Although fairly simple to figure out, the product contains absolutely no instructions. Overall this sight is false hope, at least, for a left hand PSE BRITE FORCE RTS.
customer_reviews.author: flipmo101

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I like the site but it has more movement "up and down play" than I like.
customer_reviews.author: Bud r

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for the money but the cons outweigh the pros. No tape (are you kidding me trophy ridge?) I'm not buying sight tape from hha because trophy ridge is cheap. One of the screws stripped out with minimal use, very cheap material or it was a return. The screw on the slider (if backed out too much) will scratch off the finish on your riser. Save your money and get an HHA or Spothogg.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way you can adjust this sight quickly and easily after you have set your ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Slavens

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal.
customer_reviews.text: Good sight for the money, easy to get sighted in. Only problem, no yardage tapes for the sight. Thats gonna make it a little difficult when I upgrade to a new bow.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Brooker

customer_reviews.title: great sight i have already killed a deer and a ...
customer_reviews.text: great sight i have already killed a deer and a squirrel with this! very bright pin and comes with light!
customer_reviews.author: PureAmerican653

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: As with all of the Trophy Ridge sights I ever owned the Pursuit is well built and very easy to tune and operate an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: pilot107

customer_reviews.title: Ihad a great time working with this site easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Ihad a great time working with this site easy to set up holds postion well This site works well with my Bowtech Insansty cpx Best site I ever purhese Ever one should buy this site
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: accuracy Plus!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ounce you set it up,Use this sight along with a rangefinder and you will be amazed at the accuracy that you will achieve!No more (I used the wrong pin). I hit a tennis ball at 50 yards with a Broadhead arrow! Leave it set at 20 yards for most hunting shots!
customer_reviews.author: George Louis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accurate so far
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this from my traditional 3 pin sight. WORTH IT. Much easier to focus on one pin as opposed to three, and you don't need to worry about moving them around with a tiny hex wrench. Pretty accurate so far, spend the extra money and get a good sliding pin like this!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome site
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money! After 5 shots at 20 yards move out to 40 then 60... dead on! So easy to mount and sight in.
customer_reviews.author: bolt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sight
customer_reviews.text: Quick an easy install just a few min. to sight in by using hha sight strips. They should send sight strips along with it other that that is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Lee C.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: After installing this sight on my bow it literally took me 3 arrows to get it sighted in at 20 yards on my bowtech regulator. After that it was just all about fine tuning up to 50 yards. Now you can buy the HHA sight strips but I just use a sharpie just to mark 20, 30, 40, 50 yards. You can play around with it to use to your advantage, but this is without a doubt the best single pin sight I have bought for a decent price. The reason for the 4 stars was that it is not super smooth when sliding the yardage marker up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: The Trophy Ridge Pusuit Vertical Pin Sight right Hand Is Ok. Not quite as good as some of the other one pin sites but dose work.
customer_reviews.author: Hunterc0206

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ONE PIN ADJUSTABLE SIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Great sight for the money does everything all the expensive sights do but your not spending all your hard earned cash.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Sharkus

customer_reviews.title: not to happy.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my sight and opened the package to find out that the light does not work, not to happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great site, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both put one on our bows before the R100 in our area we both thought it was great, easy to use, made it easier to adjust quickly to each target distance we both improved our scores compared to last year without it
customer_reviews.author: Connie Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great Sight Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great sight for a great price! Thought about putting an HHA sight on but found this for a cheaper price. It is very similar. The first day I set it up I had it sighted in at 40 yds. Only downside is that I did notice my bow a little louder. All in all...great!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hamann

customer_reviews.title: Complet garbage
customer_reviews.text: I pulled 50 pounds and i could only shoot 15 yards at max
customer_reviews.author: reagan

customer_reviews.title: Great site for the price.
customer_reviews.text: even no its great considering what i paid i think some additional micro adjustments would have been nice. it was a pain to get all my yardage in and a pain to get it centered. if i had to get a site in the future it would for sure be the HHA. once you get it sighted in you will love it. all and all im keeping it on this bow. but i wouldnt think of putting it on my new one. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: John Bowersox

customer_reviews.title: All the adjustments for a fine tuned sight.
customer_reviews.text: I like how bright the sight pin is without the light. Easy adjustment for leveling the bubble on sight. Not always an option on other sights more expensive. Super value. Easy slide adjustment for range. Got 10 yards and 40 dialed in and i can still sight a shot out to 90 yards. 10 to 90 is more than i need but still fun hearing arrows hit a target at 90 yards. Im a novice archer and having fun with my new bow and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: sam taylor

product_meta.title: Trophy Ridge Pursuit Vertical Pin Bow Sight
product_meta.description:
Experience limitless shooting with the Pursuit. The adjustable vertical indicator pin allows you to dial-in the exact yardage needed for various environmental conditions both smoothly and silently. The Pursuit is available in two styles: left- and right-handed.

Ultimate Accuracy *  Ultra-bright .019” medium vertical fiber optic pin to easily narrow-in on your target
 *  Adjustable brightness to suit any shooting condition with the rheostat light
 *  High-performance vertical indicator pin allows for ultra-precise adjustments
 *  Maintain accuracy through low and changing light with glo indicator pins

Durable Construction *  100% engineered aluminum
 *  Designed for the right-handed shooter

Silent Adjustments *  Delrin bushings that create smooth, quiet movement with no metal-to-metal contact
feature_bullets: High-performance vertical pin allows for sight’s ultra-precise adjustments
Delrin bushings create smooth, quiet movement with no metal-to-metal contact
Adjustable brightness to suit any visibility condition with the rheostat light
Maintain accuracy through low and changing light with glo indicator pins
Ultimate visibility with ultra-bright .019” medium vertical fiber optic pin

specifications.Manufacturer: Escalade Sports / Bear Archery / Trophy Ridge
